name: Madison 2
description: Madison is a classic portfolio theme featuring a fixed navigation column alongside a fluid, scrollable main column. Content loads and fades-in as the user scrolls; allowing for deep collections of content without sacrificing page speed. Madison comes with a variety of style presets and loads of customization controls.
